fields.label: Include Testimonials?
fields.name: include_testiimonials
fields.instructions: Check this box to include the 'Testimonials' custom post type

fields.label: Include Results?
fields.name: include_results
fields.instructions: Check this box to include the 'Results' custom post type

fields.label: Font - Secondary Font
fields.name: font_secondary
fields.instructions: Please note, if you only want to use one font total on this site, please use this field and select the same font chosen above as your primary font.

fields.label: Font Color - H2
fields.name: h2_font_color
fields.instructions: H2 font color - inside main body copy block

fields.label: Font Color - H3
fields.name: h3_font_color
fields.instructions: H3 font color - inside main body copy block

fields.label: Font Color - H4
fields.name: h4_font_color
fields.instructions: H4 font color - inside main body copy block

fields.label: Font Color - Body Copy
fields.name: body_font_color
fields.instructions: Primary font color - color used for all fonts between the header and footer

fields.label: Color - Primary 1
fields.name: color_primary_1
fields.instructions: Primary site color - used for header & footer background, sidebar titles

fields.label: Color - Primary 2
fields.name: color_primary_2
fields.instructions: Primary site accent color - used for button color, link hover, etc

fields.label: Color - Secondary
fields.name: color_secondary_1
fields.instructions: Main secondary site color, used as background color for awards block and sidebar testimonials block.

fields.label: Color - Secondary 2
fields.name: color_secondary_2
fields.instructions: Main secondary site color, used as background color for awards block and sidebar testimonials block.

fields.label: Color - Page Background
fields.name: color_page_bg
fields.instructions: Background color used behind main body content between header and footer

fields.label: Primary Button Style
fields.name: primary_button_style
fields.instructions: This is the button style used in the header banner.

fields.label: Secondary Button Style
fields.name: secondary_button_style
fields.instructions: This is the global button style used in all places outside of the header banner.

fields.label: Include gradient overlay?
fields.name: include_gradient_overlay
fields.instructions: Check this box to include a gradient overlay on main banner image

fields.label: Color - Banner Gradient
fields.name: color_banner_gradient
fields.instructions: Background gradient overlay color (100% at the bottom, 85% at the top)

fields.label: Color - Banner Gradient Opacity
fields.name: color_banner_gradient_opacity
fields.instructions: Background gradient overlay color (100% at the bottom, 85% at the top)

fields.label: Default Background Image
fields.name: default_background_image
fields.instructions: This will appear unless a unique image is chosen for a specific page.

fields.label: Color - Banner Fonts
fields.name: color_banner_fonts
fields.instructions: Primary site color - used for header & footer background, sidebar titles

fields.label: Practice Area Menu
fields.name: practice_area_menu
fields.instructions: You will need to first create the menu you want to include in Appearance > Menus. Once created, you will be able to select it here.

fields.label: Footer Logo
fields.name: footer_logo
fields.instructions: Theme uses the same logo file for header and footer by default. Use this field if a different logo is required in the footer (stacked, reversed, etc). Leave blank if not needed.
